translations: （与）几代人（有关）的；影响几代人的；代与代之间的

sentences.sentence: Nor is there any sign of the intergenerational warfare predicted in the 1990s.
sentences.translation: 也没有任何迹象表明会出现上世纪90年代预测的两代人之间的战争。

sentences.sentence: The health of adolescents also has an intergenerational effect.
sentences.translation: 青少年健康也有代际影响。

sentences.sentence: This is “the key intergenerational issue”; they “feel frightened of their loss of control”.
sentences.translation: 他对此感到惊讶。 这是“两代人之间的关键问题”；他们“生怕失去对孩子的控制”。
